testcase.classname: Scenario: Convert to Celsius from Fahrenheit
testcase.name: Given I want to convert 98.6 degree Fahrenheit to Celsius
testcase.system-out:
Feature: Convert between different unit of temperatures
Formula: C/5 = (F - 32)/9 C = 5(F - 32)/9 => 5(98.6 - 32)/9 = 37

testcase.classname: Scenario: Convert to Celsius from Fahrenheit
testcase.name: When I input the value of Fahrenheit as 98.6 in text field

testcase.classname: Scenario: Convert to Celsius from Fahrenheit
testcase.name: Then It should be converted to Celsius as 37 degree
